item.title: Cheerleader Effect
item.description:
The Cheerleader Effect: Why We Find Groups More Attractive (and What to Do About It) #

Ever notice how a group of friends often seems more attractive than each individual when seen separately? Understanding this bias is key to making better decisions, navigating social situations more effectively, and becoming a sharper thinker. Let’s dive in!
